mapper.insert: insert into users (username, email, password, register_date, `role`) values (#{registerRequest.username}, #{registerRequest.email}, #{registerRequest.password}, #{registerDate}, #{role})
mapper.update: update users set `role` = #{role} where id = #{operatedUserId} and `role` < ${role}
mapper.select: select * from users where email = #{email} and password = #{password}
select count(*) from users where username = #{username}
select count(*) from users where email = #{email}
